subject: Request to reinstate discount for incomplete purchase
description_text:
Dear Simmson Team,

During the Christmas holiday period, I attempted to purchase one of your
products while a promotional discount was available. Unfortunately, due to
an issue with my bank, I was unable to complete the payment process.

I am now interested in finalizing the purchase; however, the discount is no
longer active.
I am therefore writing to kindly ask whether it would be possible to apply
the same discount to this purchase, considering that the issue was beyond
my control.

Thank you very much for your time and availability. I look forward to your
kind response.

Best regards,
Matteo

conversations.body_text: Hi Matteo Servalli,  I apologize for the delayed response.  I see your order has already been discounted. Is there anything else I can assist you with? Should you have any further questions, please feel free to contact us. We will respond promptly.

No, thank you. I noticed that your coupon was still valid even though the
expiration date had passed.
